attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petiion is to stop lottery funding being directed to one single cause -sport and mainly to one single area the south-east at the expense of voluntry and community groups across the country. Any potential benefits that arise from 2012 will be too late for some groups who have been denied funding and cease to provide benefits to their community

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop more Lottery funding being allocated to the 2012 Olympics and to allow it to be used for its primary purpose, that of communty support across the whole of the country."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11600.asp
